Class ClobberBot

java.lang.Object
  ClobberBot
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClobberBot2, ClobberBot3, ClobberBot4, ClobberBot5, ClobberBot6, GUIClobberBot, p1, p10, p2, p3, p4, p5, p6, p7, p8, p9
public class ClobberBot
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements an example ClobberBot that makes random moves. All ClobberBots should extend this class and override the takeTurn and drawMe methods.

Constructor Detail

ClobberBot

Method Detail

informID

public void informID(int id)
Used by the game to inform each bot of its game ID. You can use this to search through the list of bot positions you are passed each turn to differentiate between your teamates and your foes

getID

public int getID()
public method you can use to query for a bots game ID

setEnvironment

public void setEnvironment(java.awt.Dimension worldSize)

teammate

public void teammate(ClobberBot bot)
Used by the game to tell each bot who its teamates are before the game begins.

takeTurn

public ClobberBotAction takeTurn(WhatIKnow currState)
This method is called once for each bot for each turn. The bot should look at what it knows, and make an appropriate decision about what to do.

Parameters:
currState - contains info on this bots current position, the position of every other bot and bullet in the system.

drawMe

public void drawMe(java.awt.Graphics page,
                   java.awt.geom.Point2D me)
Draws the clobber bot to the screen. The drawing should be centered at the point me, and should not be bigger than 9x9 pixels

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Your bots identifier string. It must be unique from other players, since I use it to determine who your teamates are. You can include you rlogin name in the id to guarantee uniqueness.

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
